reviews.review_text: Forestry 2017 - The Simulation is exactly what it says it is and what it is supossed to do. Just by watching the trailer you will get aclear understanding of what the game is about, but I can further explain that you will play with lots of tools associated with, of course, the theme: forestry simulation.   My experience with it was very pleasant, smooth gameplay together with fancy visuals and neat sounds. I particularly like to try mastering the machines as soon as possible because it will help a lot on winning more revenue from all actions. The main purpose will be to expand your company, and to do so you will need to sell a lot of woosd logs and other related products.  Forestry 17 is a great title, aware of any other forestry simulator out there. BUT!!!!! ---> Needs Steam Trading Cards!!!

The open world is big,but needs more movement. I really love this game's feel and atmospehere. It makes me feel like I'm actually a lumberjack at times. The graphics are top notch and the mechanics are amazing. I would definitely recommend it to a friend!

If you like cutting trees, this gamer does exactly what it says. It's a little different to get into, but once you do, it's pretty fun. The only drawback I have is its repetition. Other than that it's totally worth buying, especially if you love simulation games.
